paragraph.paragraph:
Located in the
00_introduction.xml Organize Favorites dialog , this command
/images/eiffelstudio/browsing_tools/favorites_dialog_new_class.png provides a way of adding a class to the favorites. When clicked, a new dialog is popped up, that allows to select a class among the clusters of the system:

Clicking on a class name sets its name in the top text field, whereas double-clicking it automatically selects it and closes the dialog box. It is also possible to directly type the name of the wanted class in the top text field to select it.

The selected class goes to the root of the favorite tree. It is then possible to
30_move_to_folder.xml move it to a different favorite folder.
